text: Money marriage refers to a marriage where a girl, usually, is married off to a man to settle debts owed by her parents. The female is referred to as a money wife. Money marriage is known to be a practice in Becheve, in south eastern Nigeria where girls as young as three get married in such a way. The practice is illegal in Nigeria. ==References== Category:Human rights abuses Category:Types of marriage Category:Forced marriage
title: Money marriage
